name: University of California, Berkeley
description:
I was a visiting scholar for a semester at UC, Berkeley where I pursued a certification course majoring in Entreprenurship from the Sutardja Center of Entrepreneurship & Technology and also took several classes from School of Computing.
 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐞𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤: Data Science and it's Applications, Blockchain & Fintech AI challenge lab, Product Development and Design, Introduction to Entrepreneurship
